channel.title: NPC Position
channel.description: I am wondering how to move my npc's, a.k.a the shop owners to a different location, if you know how please tell

item.title: NPC Position
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

the position has to do with the last digit in autospawn i think.
just play with it, try changing it into different numbers (1-4)

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Position
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:342604”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=439004.msg3226151#msg3226151 date=1275595361]
umm it has to do with the last digit in autospawn i think.
just play with it, try chaing it into different numbers (1-4)

Would help to know the server type.

he means the deob (317, 508, 602…)
^^ i said that just cuz 50% people ask that when they dont know what a server type is
[/quote]
You do realize ‘deob’ is short for ‘deobfuscate’ which has nothing to do with the client version right?[/quote]aint that the cache?

and usman i was wrong since someone said it was an 317; i read the earlier one saying 508.
i editted it now

Read full topic
